channel.title: Gas mask sprite EDIT (Error, Client Freeze) Help?
channel.description:
Ok, So i've just got back to RSC Servers. Fooling around with somthing ive not touched before. Sprite.
So im using RSCD Sprite Editor. Editing Gas Mask to look like a Balaclava.
So far.... I've edited the sprites to look like the below picture.
[img]http://i38.tinypic.com/308bqld.jpg[/img]
Then ive saved them as sprite's into RSCD Sprite editors, Sprites folder.
[img]http://i34.tinypic.com/vp95ch.jpg[/img]
Then ive packed the files into the Client side file, Sprites.rscd (all which was successfull!)
Then Itemdef.xml Edited. To the sprite id i want it to be viewed as in my invent. But still the client is freezing up.
[img]http://i33.tinypic.com/2yux6zd.jpg[/img]
If i've missed somthing, Please dont be shy to share :) Thanks

item.title: Gas mask sprite EDIT (Error, Client Freeze) Help?
item.dc:creator: @elyad elyad
item.description:
@elyad wrote:

Cheer’s Motaro. I’ll give it another go. Was irritating me the other night so i give it a rest.

Read full topic

item.title: Gas mask sprite EDIT (Error, Client Freeze) Help?
item.dc:creator: @Motaro Motaro
item.description:
@Motaro wrote:

elyad:

So do you not have to edit every individual sprite? 1432 - 1448 and there X/Y Shifts etc?

Yes you have to edit every individual sprite to match the original sprites id, shifts, height, etc…

Just try doing one at a time to make sure it’s working.

Read full topic

item.source: Gas mask sprite EDIT (Error, Client Freeze) Help?

item.title: Gas mask sprite EDIT (Error, Client Freeze) Help?
item.dc:creator: @Motaro Motaro
item.description:
@Motaro wrote:

Straight black won’t show up in game, it will be see through so you need to change that, and don’t have a white background because white will show in game.

You’ll want to make the mask white with a black background and change the overlay to black… so just invert all the pictures.

All you have to do it open up the editor and find the edited .png file or whatever, and open in the editor and change everything circled in red to match the original gas mask sprite.

So your 1434 sprite should look the same, just with the new image.

After you edit those press refresh at the top, change your overlay, and then save the sprite.

Read full topic
item.source: Gas mask sprite EDIT (Error, Client Freeze) Help?

item.title: Gas mask sprite EDIT (Error, Client Freeze) Help?
item.dc:creator: @elyad elyad
item.description:
@elyad wrote:

I’ve edited the sprites, Obviously i have to edited all the sprite in paint, 1431 - 1448. As this is how it will look in different camera angles? Repacked it into the ‘’ sprites.rscd ‘’ file and still. My client freezes.

Read full topic
item.source: Gas mask sprite EDIT (Error, Client Freeze) Help?

item.title: Gas mask sprite EDIT (Error, Client Freeze) Help?
item.dc:creator: @Motaro Motaro
item.description:
@Motaro wrote:

So you’re just turning the gas mask black?

The only thing you should have to do it edit the sprite in paint and re pack it.

Make sure that when you save the sprites that the x-shift and y-shift(or whatever it’s called) are exactly the same as the old gas mask. You can edit those in the bottom of the editor.

Read full topic

item.source: Gas mask sprite EDIT (Error, Client Freeze) Help?

item.title: Gas mask sprite EDIT (Error, Client Freeze) Help?
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

My explanation was merely regarding the ‘inventory image’. To arrive at the inventory image sprite, you take the sprite number, and minus the start point of the ‘inventory image sprites’, ie: 2150.

My guess is that the client is freezing upon trying to wield it?

Read full topic
item.source: Gas mask sprite EDIT (Error, Client Freeze) Help?

item.title: Gas mask sprite EDIT (Error, Client Freeze) Help?
item.dc:creator: @elyad elyad
item.description:
@elyad wrote:

[quote=“yong min, post:4, topic:357916”] <sprite>1431</sprite>

This is referring to the inventory image. The inventory images start from sprite 2150. The gas mask inventory sprite is 2382. That would be the one you would be using to represent your inventory image of the ‘balaclava’.

Take that sprite number ‘2382’, and minus ‘2150’ from it, giving ‘232’, which would be used as your sprite.

<sprite>232</sprite> [/quote]

Hey Yong, So i took in what you said, And i found the sprite img 2382. My inventory Gas mask image. Edited to look like image 1431. Packed it into my Client side, Sprites.rscd.

Then in server def files, Edited Itemdef.xml Sprite id to 232, Im not entirely sure why i have to use 232? But i went with what you said. Compressed etc. And still client freezes. So i tried changing sprite id to 2382 in Itemdef.xml and still no luck.

Read full topic
item.source: Gas mask sprite EDIT (Error, Client Freeze) Help?
